original_text: These men were the leaders of their clans: Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah and Jahdiel. They were brave soldiers and people respected them. They were leaders of their clans.
korean_text: 그들의 족장은 에벨과 이시와 엘리엘과 아스리엘과 예레미야와 호다위야와 야디엘이며 다 용감하고 유명한 족장이었더라

sentences.original_text: These men were the leaders of their clans
Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah and Jahdiel
sentences.korean_translation: 에벨, 이시, 엘리엘, 아스리엘, 예레미야, 호다위야, 야디엘

sentences.original_text: They were leaders of their clans
